SELECT L.LOG_ID , L.EMP_ID , TO_CHAR(L.LGN_SCC_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LGN_SCC_DT , TO_CHAR(L.LGT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LGT_DT , L.DEL_YN , E.EMP_NAME FROM LOGIN_LOG L JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_ID = L.EMP_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(LGN_SCC_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND L.EMP_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(L.LGN_SCC_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(L.LGT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND E.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY L.LGN_SCC_DT
